verbs.description: The new force [V: will] be " separate but equal " with the Air Force , Trump said .
[ARG1: The new force] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: " separate but equal " with the Air Force] , Trump said .
[ARG1: The new force will be " separate but equal " with the Air Force] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] .
